lead_paragraph: Seventy-five million users have downloaded Windows 10 to their personal computers and tablets in the first month of its release, Microsoft announced.

headline.main: Free Windows 10 Is Downloaded 75 Million Times
headline.print_headline: Free Windows 10 Is Downloaded 75 Million Times

snippet: Seventy-five million users have downloaded Windows 10 to their personal computers and tablets in the first month of its release, Microsoft announced.
